TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HeaderHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle processing of headers on the stream during deserialization.
Docs.returns: A that conveys information about a remote function call.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.Header> objects are used to convey information about a remote function call (for example, transaction ID or a method signature).
When you create a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler>, you identify the method that will handle the event. For an overview, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17sde2xt(v=vs.110).aspx).
